antgame.core.world

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • antgame.core.world.World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a game world.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      World(Cell[][] cells)
      Creates a new world from the given cell array.

    • Method Summary

      Finds the cell adjacent to a given cell, in a given direction.

      Checks if a given cell satisfies the given condition, with the question asked by an ant of a particular Colony

    • Constructor Detail

      • World

        public World(Cell[][] cells)
        Creates a new world from the given cell array.
        Parameters:
        cells - an array describing the cells that make up the world

    • Method Detail

      • adjacent

        public Cell adjacent(Cell cell,
                     Direction direction)
        Finds the cell adjacent to a given cell, in a given direction.
        Parameters:
        cell - the given cell
        direction - the direction to move
        Returns:
        the adjacent cell when moving one step in the given direction

      • check

        public boolean check(Condition condition,
                     Colony asking,
                     Cell cell)
        Checks if a given cell satisfies the given condition, with the question asked by an ant of a particular Colony
        Parameters:
        condition - the condition to check for
        asking - the colony that is 'asking the question'
        cell - the cell to check the condition on
        Returns:
        true if the condition holds for the cell, otherwise false

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints a world. Currently for debugging. TODO: maybe move this to a better location.
